summary: Initial production release of LawLlama with complete enterprise feature set including RAG pipeline, orchestration system, MCP integration, and model management.
features: Complete RAG pipeline with triple-storage (PostgreSQL + Qdrant + Neo4j)
LawLlamaBrain orchestration system with 6 subsystem adapters (Agent, Chat, Document, Tool, Workflow, DSPy)
5 MCP servers for legal tools providing 75 total specialized tools
Model-specific prompt configuration system with 3-tier fallback hierarchy
Chat feedback system with comprehensive review page
Document discovery and ingestion pipeline (27,520+ documents)
Real-time WebSocket communication for live updates
improvements: Reduced MCP server initialization from 25s to 5s via parallel testing (Session 187)
Improved API uptime from 72% to 89% through resource limit fixes (Session 123)
Enhanced chat persistence and message display (Session 192)
Optimized document discovery with async scanning
Added graceful degradation for MCP server timeouts
fixes: Fixed feedback review page data display with 6 architectural fixes (Session 192)
Fixed MCP timeout causing API hangs (Session 186)
security: JWT authentication with HttpOnly cookies on all endpoints
Local-only storage policy strictly enforced (NO cloud storage)
Data encryption for all sensitive information
upgradeNotes: Initialize git submodules: git submodule update --init --recursive
Restart all services after update: docker compose restart
Verify Ollama models are available: curl http://localhost:11434/api/tags
